mapper.sql: id, name, resume, set_up_time, possess_by, Incumbent, nature, pic_url, create_time, update_time
mapper.insert: insert into t_cultural_organ (id, name, resume, set_up_time, possess_by, Incumbent, nature, pic_url, create_time, update_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{resume,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{setUpTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{possessBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{incumbent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nature,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{picUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

id,

mapper.update:
update t_cultural_organ
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
resume = #{resume,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
set_up_time = #{setUpTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
possess_by = #{possessBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Incumbent = #{incumbent,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
nature = #{nature,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
pic_url = #{picUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update t_cultural_organ set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, resume = #{resume,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, set_up_time = #{setUpTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, possess_by = #{possessBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Incumbent = #{incumbent,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, nature = #{nature,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pic_url = #{picUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update.foreach: INSERT INTO t_cultural_organ (id, name, resume, set_up_time, possess_by, incumbent, nature,pic_url,create_time,update_time) VALUES (#{item.id},#{item.name},#{item.resume},#{item.setUpTime},#{item.possessBy},#{item.incumbent},#{item.nature},#{item.picUrl},now(),now()) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE name=#{item.name},resume=#{item.resume},set_up_time=#{item.setUpTime},possess_by=#{item.possessBy},incumbent=#{item.incumbent} ,nature=#{item.nature},pic_url=#{item.picUrl},update_time=now()
